payment.invoiceDescription: Pay conveniently by invoice. You will immediately receive access to all features.
payment.creditCardDescription: Pay securely and conveniently with your credit card. Apple Pay or Google Pay are also available.

processingModal.title: Just a moment... ☕
processingModal.description: Your transcription is being created. Our AI is working at full speed! This might take a little moment. Why not grab a coffee – we'll send you an email as soon as your text is ready.
processingModal.subscriberTip: Tip: With a Diktat AI subscription, it'll be even faster next time! Subscribers benefit from prioritized processing.

subscriptionLimit.message: You have reached your transcription time limit. Please subscribe to continue using the service.

projectMode.filePerProjectDescription: Each file will be processed as a separate project.

closedModal.title: Welcome & Thank You for Your Trust!
closedModal.subtitle: We're glad you've registered for Dictate AI!
closedModal.message: We're very pleased with the great interest. Currently, our capacities are temporarily fully utilized. We ask for your patience. You will automatically receive an email as soon as you can start.

premiumModal.title: Get more out of your transcription!
premiumModal.description:
Enhance your results with premium features like context, speaker diarization, and higher quality. These are included in our subscriptions.

Upgrade now for more precise, better-structured transcripts!
premiumModal.multipleFiles: Uploading multiple files is a Pro feature. Upgrade to process multiple files simultaneously!

fileSizeErrorModal.title: File Size Limit Exceeded
fileSizeErrorModal.description: One or more of your files exceeds our maximum size limit. Please reduce the file size or split it into smaller parts.
fileSizeErrorModal.defaultError: File size exceeds the maximum allowed limit.
fileSizeErrorModal.freeUser: Your file ({size}MB) exceeds the 100MB limit for free users after their first upload. First-time users can upload up to 2GB. Subscribe to Pro for unlimited 2GB uploads.
fileSizeErrorModal.proUser: Your file ({size}MB) exceeds the maximum limit of 2GB. Please split the file into smaller parts.
fileSizeErrorModal.firstTimeUser: As a first-time user, you can upload files up to 2GB. Your file ({size}MB) is within the limit!

fileFormatErrorModal.title: File Format Not Supported
fileFormatErrorModal.description: One or more of your files are in an unsupported format. Please convert the files to a supported format and try again.

dragDropFallback.toast: The dropped item is not supported. Please select an audio or video file.

durationLimitModal.title: Ready to Go Pro?
durationLimitModal.message: Your {minutes}-minute audio exceeds the free 10-minute limit. Unlock unlimited length uploads and finish your transcription with a free 7-day trial of Pro.

uploadAnimation.title: Files are being uploaded
uploadAnimation.warning: Please do not leave this page during upload

billingInformation.creditCardOptional: Only fill out if an invoice or AVV is required.

error.unexpectedFormat: Failed to load project: Unexpected response format

upsellModal.title: Upgrade Required
upsellModal.message: {feature} is a premium feature. Upgrade to Diktat AI Pro to access this functionality and unlock enhanced transcription capabilities.

magicTranscript.title: Magic Transcript
magicTranscript.description: Use AI to improve your transcript with custom processing. This will create a new version of your transcript.
magicTranscript.promptPlaceholder: E.g., 'Correct grammar and spelling', 'Format as a professional report', 'Add paragraph breaks', etc.
magicTranscript.upgradePrompt: Upgrade to Pro for access to more powerful models

interviewTranscript.title: Create Interview Transcript
interviewTranscript.description: Assign names to speakers in your transcript. Each speaker ID will be replaced with the name you provide.

help.title: Help & Contact
help.subtitle: We're here to help you
help.description: Find quick answers to common questions or contact us directly.

howToUpload.question: How do I upload an audio file?
howToUpload.answer: Go to the transcription page, drag and drop your file or click on the upload area. We support MP3, WAV, MP4, M4A, AAC, and more formats.

supportedFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answer: We support most audio and video formats: MP3, WAV, MP4, M4A, AAC, OGG, OPUS, WEBM, and FLAC.

maxFileSize.question: What is the maximum file size?
maxFileSize.answer: Free users can upload files up to 100MB. First-time users and Pro subscribers can upload files up to 2GB.

processingTime.question: How long does transcription take?
processingTime.answer: Processing time depends on the length of your recording. Typically it takes a few minutes. You will receive an email once your transcription is ready.

changeSubscription.question: How can I change my subscription?
changeSubscription.answer: Go to Profile > Subscription to manage, upgrade, or cancel your plan.

email.title: Email Contact
email.description: For questions or problems, you can reach us by email at any time:

contactForm.title: Contact Form
contactForm.description: Describe your issue and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactForm.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

message.label: Your Message
message.placeholder: Describe your request or problem in as much detail as possible...
message.hint: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

screenshot.label: Screenshot or Image (optional)
screenshot.hint: Add a screenshot to help us better understand your issue.
screenshot.dragDrop: Drag an image here or click to upload

error.general: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.
error.imageSize: The image is too large. Please select an image under 5MB.
error.imageFormat: Invalid image format. Please use PNG, JPG, or WEBP.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.processInitiated: Process initiated! Our team will contact you soon regarding your subscription request.
subscription.ticketError: Failed to create support ticket. Please try again or contact support directly.
subscription.cancellationError: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again or contact support.
subscription.customerCenterError: Failed to open customer portal. Please try again or contact support.

sendAudio.title: Send Audio Files
sendAudio.description: Send one or more audio files to your personal email address to have them automatically transcribed.
sendAudio.formats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC, OGG, MP4

projectOrganization.title: Project Organization
projectOrganization.singleFile: A single audio file creates a new project
projectOrganization.multipleFiles: Multiple audio files in one email are grouped in the same project
projectOrganization.subject: The email subject is used as the project name
projectOrganization.content: The email content is stored as project context

tips.title: Tips for Optimal Results
tips.subject: Use a meaningful subject to easily identify your project
tips.quality: Ensure good audio quality with minimal background noise
tips.organization: Organize related recordings in one email for better overview

mailconfirm.title: Email Confirmation
mailconfirm.message: Please check your email and click the confirmation link
mailconfirm.linkFailedDescription: The confirmation link has expired or is invalid.
mailconfirm.enterCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your email and your email address to confirm your account.

purchaseSuccess.title: Purchase Successful
purchaseSuccess.message: Thank you for your purchase! Your account has been updated.

students.title: Interview Transcription for Students and Researchers - Dictate AI
students.description: Dictate AI for students and researchers: Convert lectures, seminars, and interviews into searchable text effortlessly. Save time on learning and research.
